name: DischargeForInpatientStay
title: Discharge for Inpatient Stay
description: This value set is created for the purpose of identifying an acute or nonacute inpatient discharges.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Discharge from an acute or nonacute inpatient hospital.  Can be discharge from a psychiatric hospital.),(Data Element Scope: Claim, Explanation of Benefit, Encounter, or Procedure),(Inclusion Criteria: Discharge from an acute or nonacute inpatient hospital.  Can be discharge from a psychiatric hospital.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclusions defined separately.)

concept.display: Hospital discharge day management; 30 minutes or less
Hospital discharge day management; more than 30 minutes

contains.display: Hospital inpatient or observation discharge day management; 30 minutes or less on the date of the encounter
Hospital inpatient or observation discharge day management; more than 30 minutes on the date of the encounter
